EditorModes

Class EditMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • EditorModes.EditMode
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddButton, AddMovingBox, AddOnceButton, AddPowerUp, DeleteMode, MoveObject, ObjectMode, ResizeMode, RotateObject

    public abstract class EditMode
extends java.lang.Object
    Edit Mode is a abstract class that is used is used to set the editor to a certain mode (or state). Each edit mode specifies what the editor should do when the mouse is clicked, dragged of released.
    Author:
    Tom Hogervorst
